name: searchQuery
description: Breaks a question or search query into structured parts. Helps understanding user queries, retrieve and augment the results effectively.

keywords.description: The keywords or phrases to search for

targets.description: The targets to search within, such as modules, categories, departments, etc. If not specified, this should be an empty array and all targets will be searched.

explainer.description: Join all keywords and targets (if exists) into a human readable sentence to convey what action is being taken. Example: 'Searching for cats' or 'Searching for dogs in Photos and Videos.'
